thread.title: FDA approves new drug to treat hyperkalemia (FDA - Food and Drug Administration)
thread.title_full: FDA approves new drug to treat hyperkalemia (FDA - Food and Drug Administration) - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: FDA approves new drug to treat hyperkalemia (FDA - Food and Drug Administration)
text: ( Source : FDA - Food and Drug Administration ) The U.S. Food and Drug Administration today approved Veltassa (patiromer for oral suspension) to treat hyperkalemia, a serious condition in which the amount of potassium in the blood is too high.
